main_topic.author: OminousDude
main_topic.title: I don't mean to be a snitch but...
main_topic.content: I was looking through the leaderboard and there are 2 of these accounts. Isn't this against kaggle rules?

comments.author: Ravi Ramakrishnan
comments.content: Kaggle will take care of cases that violate compliance rules at the end of the competition. The final leaderboard will be sanitized and then prizes will be distributed [@max1mum](https://www.kaggle.com/max1mum)
